payment.question: How do I pay?
payment.answer: You can pay via credit card, debit card, or PayPal.

payment.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.answer: We accept Visa, MasterCard, American Express, and PayPal.

payment.question: Is cash on delivery available?
payment.answer: Yes, cash on delivery is available for select locations.

payment.question: Can I pay using Apple Pay or Google Pay?
payment.answer: We currently accept Apple Pay and Google Pay for online purchases.

return_policy.question: What is the return policy?
return_policy.answer: You can return products within 30 days of purchase.

return_policy.question: Can I return an item after 30 days?
return_policy.answer: Unfortunately, returns are only accepted within 30 days of purchase.

return_policy.question: How do I request a return?
return_policy.answer: To request a return, log in to your account and navigate to the 'Order History' section.

return_policy.question: Will I get a refund for returned items?
return_policy.answer: Yes, refunds will be issued within 7-10 business days once the return is processed.

buying.question: How do I place an order?
buying.answer: To place an order, select the products you want to purchase, add them to your cart, and proceed to checkout.

buying.question: Can I track my order?
buying.answer: Yes, you can track your order through the 'Order History' section on your account.

buying.question: Are there any discounts for first-time buyers?
buying.answer: Yes, we offer a 10% discount for first-time buyers. Use code FIRST10 at checkout.

buying.question: Can I cancel my order?
buying.answer: Orders can be canceled within 24 hours of placing the order. Contact support for assistance.

shipping.question: What are the shipping options?
shipping.answer: We offer standard, express, and overnight shipping options.

shipping.question: How much does shipping cost?
shipping.answer: Shipping costs vary based on the shipping method selected and your location. You can view the shipping fees at checkout.

shipping.question: Do you offer free shipping?
shipping.answer: Yes, we offer free shipping on orders over $100.

shipping.question: Can I change my shipping address after placing an order?
shipping.answer: Yes, you can change your shipping address within 24 hours of placing the order by contacting customer support.
